item.title: Show & Sale
item.description:
Show & Sale

Where?

The Seattle African Violet Societyâ€™s annual Show and Sale, held jointly with the Puget Sound Gesneriad Society, will take place at the Conservatory in Volunteer Park, Seattle, 1400 E. Galer Street, Saturday, April 26, 2025 from 10am to 3pm.

item.title: Growing Violets
item.description: ANYONE can grow beautiful African violets ANYWHERE if they will provide the simple conditions required for healthy growth. When you bring a new plant home, it may suffer at first until it gets acclimated to conditions in your home.

item.title: Membership FAQ
item.description:
Join Today!

Why should I come to a meeting?

Meetings are fun, educational, and a good opportunity to learn and share knowledge of successfully growing African violets and other Gesneriads. Participation is at your discretion. No member is forced to participate beyond their comfort level. Prepare to have fun and meet people that share a common interest.
